text: Ri David nojinaq che ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel che are xubꞌij: Ri Ajawxel xubꞌij che ri wAjaw: Chattꞌuyul pa ri nuwiqiqꞌabꞌ, 12:36 Ri winaq ri katꞌuyiꞌ pa uwiqiqꞌabꞌ jun nim taqanel, we are ri Dios o jachin jun ri kꞌo taqanik pa uqꞌabꞌ, kel kubꞌij chi ri winaq riꞌ kayaꞌtaj na nim taqanik pa uqꞌabꞌ. kꞌa kinya na pa awaqan konojel ri akꞌulel.12:36 Salmos 110:1.
